name: Little Red Riding Hood - Construct Animation
name_original: Little Red Riding Hood - Construct Animation
description: My design goals were initially to add a lot of trees, closer and closer to each other to make the scene progressively darker and scarier. But as I advanced through the project I decided to make a short animation of the dialogue between Red Riding Hood and the wolf at the grandma's house. I then went for a more comedic ending, with the "wasted" something unexpected and funny.
